text: Pure is the sixth studio album by Maksim Mrvica. It was internationally released by MBO on 22 November 2007. ==Track listing== # "Dies Irae" (Giuseppe Verdi) # "Hall Of The Mountain King" (Edvard Grieg) # "Exodus" (Ernest Gold) # "Croatian Rhapsody" (Tonči Huljić) # "Passionata" (Tonči Huljić) # "Somewhere in Time" (John Barry) # "Yellow River" (Xian Xinghai) # "Cubana" (Tonči Huljić) # "Claudine" (Tonči Huljić) # "New World Concerto" (Antonn Dvořk) # "Poseidon's Tale" (Tonči Huljić) # "Child In Paradise" (Tonči Huljić) # "Flight Of The Bumble-bee" (Rimsky-Korsakov) ==See also== *Pure II ==References== ==External links== *Maksim "Pure" *Toshiba-EMI Maksim's Japan site Category:2007 albums Category:Maksim Mrvica albums Category:Classical crossover albums
title: Pure (Maksim Mrvica album)
